background-color.comment: The background color of the Promo component.

border.comment: The border of the Promo component.

max-width.comment: The maximum width of the Promo component.

breakpoint.comment: The Promo component breakpoint at which large viewport styles begin.

image-narrow-max-height.comment: The maximum height of the image in the Promo component on narrow viewports.

image-narrow-max-width.comment: The maximum width of the image in the Promo component on narrow viewports.

title-font-color.comment: The title font color of the Promo component.

title-font-weight.comment: The title font weight of the Promo component.

subtitle-font-color.comment: The subtitle font color of the Promo component.

subtitle-font-weight.comment: The subtitle font weight of the Promo component.
